articles.title: Nintendo Today! updated to version 2.3.0, patch notes - Nintendo Everything
articles.description: The Nintendo Today! mobile app has been updated to version 2.3.0. Users should be seeing the update roll out by now. This update adds support for the app in a few new regions. You can see the full list of patches here: Nintendo Today! 2.3.0 update out now, pa…

articles.title: Google Clock 8.5 rolling out ‘swipe to dismiss’ for alarms - 9to5Google
articles.description: Version 8.5 of Google Clock for Android was released last week and it’s rolling out the ability to dismiss alarms by swiping.

articles.title: NVIDIA’s Laptop Chips, After a Long-Awaited Build-Up, Are Set to Debut This Year By Q2; N1/N1X SoCs to Challenge x86 Supremacy - Wccftech
articles.description: NVIDIA plans to release ARM-based laptop chips as soon as this year, featuring the N1/N1X variants that are expected to dominate.

articles.title: Firehound is a huge repository of App Store apps exposing data from millions of users - 9to5Mac
articles.description: An effort led by security research lab CovertLabs is actively uncovering troves of (mostly) AI-related apps that leak and expose user data.

articles.title: Video: Nintendo Highlights Enhanced Switch Games On Switch 2 - Nintendo Life
articles.description: Free updates are available for each of these titles
